description:
Raylon has got a rockin' body with muscles in just all the right places. You can tell he stays really fit, and he's got a body that can stop traffic. As the scene opens, we hear Kaden tell Raylon how it took him a while to convince him to come over and make a video.

He stands 5'11' tall and weighs in at a muscular 195 lbs. He was born in Brazil, and moved to the U.S. when he was just a wee little kid. He's super active and loves outdoor sports and surfing (go figure, with a body like that!). After some more chit-chat, Kaden says it's time to get the show on the road ... but you'll have to see what kind of show Raylon puts on for yourself. I won't bore you with the exact play-by-play, but I think you're going to like him!
title: Raylon
